column4: Aha, finally got Pidgin to behave sensibly with channels the size of #ubuntu: turn on the Join/Part hiding plugin (joinpart.so) in the standard libpurple package. D'oh...
Yeh I gave pidgin a chance, but after 2 min said NO and got xchat :P
yeah, if only it didn't use bold for said messages. It has an xchat-style neat display (right/left align), but that doesn't do url linkification :(
coloured names in xchat ftw....that's what makes me use xchat...so much easier to keep track of which message belong to who
